Main pronunciation 主要发音: yán

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning cliff.

English senses 英语理解: cliff; rocks; mountain

Usage example 用法举例: 岩石 yán shí (rock)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1520

Shuowen 说文解字: 岸也從山嚴聲

Compound 巖 flip-variant 巗 from mountain 山 shān and phonetic serious (严)嚴𡃫𡅮 yán C671 岩<巗巖嵒> simp 岩.

巗字的基本解释

巗
yán
古同“岩”。

巗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》五銜切，平銜，疑。］
亦作“壧1”。亦作“嵒1”。亦作“嵓1”。亦作“巗1”。亦作“岩1”。“險3”的被通假字。
(1)崖岸，山或高地的边。
(2)山峰。
(3)石窟；洞穴。
(4)险要。参见“巖邑”。
(5)高。
(6)高廊。
(7)岩石。构成地壳的石头。详“巖石”。
(8)古地名傅巖的略称。详“巖野”。

巗字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　巗； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页323第08
【正韻】同巖。

巗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体旧字形
巗字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Wailing
yán
The ancient same "rock".
Wailing
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" five titles cut, flat title, doubt. ]
Also known as "Jiao 1". Also known as "Rock 1". Also known as "嵓1". Also known as "Oh 1". Also known as "Rock 1". The false word for "risk 3" was passed.
(1) The edge of a cliff, a mountain or a highland.
(2) Mountain peaks.
(3) Grotto; cave.
(4) Difficulties. See "Yanyi".
(5) High.
(6) Gaolang.
(7) Rocks. The stones that make up the earth's crust. Detailed "Rocks".
(8) The abbreviation of ancient place name Fu Yan. Details "Iwano".
